com.github.mlefeb01.spigotutils.plugin.customitem.upgradableitem

Class UpgradeMeta

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.mlefeb01.spigotutils.plugin.customitem.upgradableitem.UpgradeMeta

  • public class UpgradeMeta
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores important meta associated with a AbstractItemUpgrade

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • UpgradeMeta

        public UpgradeMeta(boolean enabled,
                   int upgradeMenuSlot,
                   org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack upgradeMenuItem,
                   double valuePerLevel,
                   int maxLevel,
                   long cost,
                   Currency currency,
                   CostScaling costScaling)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        enabled - if the upgrade is enabled or not (if false, the associated upgrade will not be displayed in the tools upgrade sub menu)
        upgradeMenuSlot - the slot the upgrades display item will appear in the items respective upgrade menu (not the main menu)
        upgradeMenuItem - the actual item that will be displayed
        valuePerLevel - the value per level the upgrade will gain
        maxLevel - the max level of the upgrade
        cost - the cost of the upgrade (scales accordingly with costScaling)
        currency - the currency used for this upgrade
        costScaling - scaling behavior of the upgrade cost
